body_html: As pointed out in the #15880 thread, it's not plausible to immediately and automatically release GPU memory after GPU ops complete because TF has persistent state objects (Variables) that live in GPU memory and are not restricted to any special sub-region.
body_text: As pointed out in the #15880 thread, it's not plausible to immediately and automatically release GPU memory after GPU ops complete because TF has persistent state objects (Variables) that live in GPU memory and are not restricted to any special sub-region.
body: As pointed out in the #15880 thread, it's not plausible to immediately and automatically release GPU memory after GPU ops complete because TF has persistent state objects (Variables) that live in GPU memory and are not restricted to any special sub-region.
